text: MKS Będzin SA is a Polish professional men's volleyball team based in Będzin, founded in 2005. The club debuted in the top level Polish Volleyball League – PlusLiga in 2014. ==Team – 2020/2021== ===Coaching staff=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%; text-align:center" |- !style="width:20em"|Occupation ! colspan="2" style="width:25em"|Name |- | Head coach || colspan="2"| Jakub Bednaruk |- style="background:#EFEFEF" | Assistant coach || colspan="2"| Emil Siewiorek |- | Strength and conditioning coach || colspan="2"| Agnieszka Czura |- style="background:#EFEFEF" | Physiotherapist || colspan="2"| Adrian Brudnicki |- | Team manager || colspan="2"| Maciej Pawliński |} ===Players=== {|class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:100%; text-align:center;" |- !style="width:5em"|No. !style="width:15em"|Name !style="width:15em"|Date of birth !style="width:10em"|Position |- | 1 ||align=left| Raymond Szeto||align=right|||outside hitter |- | 2 ||align=left| Rafał Sobański||align=right|||outside hitter |- | 3 ||align=left| Łukasz Makowski||align=right|||setter |- | 4 ||align=left| Wiktor Haduch||align=right|||libero |- | 5 ||align=left| Artur Ratajczak () ||align=right|||middle blocker |- | 8 ||align=left| Tomasz Kalembka||align=right|||middle blocker |- | 10 ||align=left| Bartosz Gawryszewski||align=right|||middle blocker |- | 11 ||align=left| Thiago Veloso||align=right|||setter |- | 13 ||align=left| Kacper Bobrowski||align=right|||outside hitter |- | 14 ||align=left| Bartosz Schmidt||align=right|||middle blocker |- | 16 ||align=left| Rafał Faryna||align=right|||opposite |- | 17 ||align=left| Szymon Gregorowicz||align=right|||libero |- | 19 ||align=left| José Ademar Santana||align=right|||outside hitter |- | 21 ||align=left| Michał Godlewski||align=right|||opposite |- |} ==See also== * * ==External links== * Official website * Team profile at PlusLiga.pl * Team profile at Volleybox.net ==References== Category:Polish volleyball clubs Category:Volleyball clubs established in 2005 Category:Sport in Silesian Voivodeship
